narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: This course helped me so much with tones and drilled writing characters in a very useful way.
I gained foundational knowledge in the Chinese language; reading, writing, and speaking.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Lots of practice very fast clas

Strengths: Learned a great deal quickly. Small class size meant that students were able to practice frequently.

Weaknesses: The course moved too quickly in my opinion. There was no emphasis on retention until the final because the class moved on from each lesson so quickly it was hard to keep up. Additionally, the presentations seemed like busy work; instead of memorizing dialogue they should be actual conversations you have with the teacher or another student that are not so rehearsed and rigid. Finally, the character writing aspect did not make a great deal of sense. In an increasingly digital world, students should not be spending hours each night practicing characters that they will most likely only ever type in their lifetime.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
